title: Ticket #5746: Fix data type size confusion in gsi network io functions
description: In the functions that send blocks of GSI data over the network, we're casting between pointers of 32-bit and 64-bit datatypes and then dereferencing. This incorrect behavior is mostly harmless on little-endian machines, but will always cause problems on big-endian machines.
